Question: In December 2007 this person at Christmas was nominated for a Grammy Award.
Hints: This person earned a high school diploma in 1966 from the hospital's associated Arlington School.
On March 7, 2010, this person sang The Beatles' "In My Life" in tribute to deceased artists at the 82nd Academy Awards.
This person commented "I heard him shot—five, just as quick as you could pull the trigger, about five explosions".
